Reviews.Title: No frills phone
Reviews.Author: tennvol
Reviews.Content: This phone is for business users.  Teenagers who want cool little bubbles and animation will be disappointed.  I love it because I can display everything as text only and easily view all my messages, calendars, etc on one page-it keeps me on track with a glance.  Downside is the battery.  In spite of the manufacturer's claim of best-in-class battery life, I've found on both of my IPaq's that the battery life is less than average.

Reviews.Title: I guess I will have to upgrade
Reviews.Author: B. Mccolley
Reviews.Content: 2nd phone same problem. The touch screen dies and you have to use the arrow button to navigate, which doesn't always work.

Reviews.Title: got it quick an fast
Reviews.Author: sao charmant
Reviews.Content: it came fast I bought it for my cell phone store ill hope the customer don't have a problem with ill keep you guy updated. so far so good

Reviews.Title: unlocking
Reviews.Author: lorenzo
Reviews.Content: this has been impossible to unlock cellular, not recommended, unless you use it for at & t company. I have dealt with more than 5 companies release and until now nothing.

Reviews.Title: HP IPAQ Glisten
Reviews.Author: Derrick Mickens
Reviews.Content: The HP Glisten AT&T; meets my requirements. I greatly appreciate the item.Thank You. I would like to try different SIM cards for best performance.

ProductInfo.Features:
AT&T; LOCKED model, only works with AT&T.; Will not work with any other phone company, unless you unlock the phone.
2G Network	GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G Network	HSDPA 850 / 1900 / 2100
DISPLAY	Type	AMOLED resistive touchscreen, 256K colors (65K effective colors) Size	320 x 240 pixels, 2.5 inches (~160 ppi pixel density)
CAMERA	Primary	3.15 MP, 2048x1536 pixels, autofocus Video	Yes Secondary	No
Microsoft Windows Mobile 6.5 Professional Chipset	Qualcomm MSM7200 CPU	528 MHz ARM 11 GPU	Adreno 130
ProductInfo.Name: HP iPAQ Glisten AT&T Locked QuadBand GPS WiFi HSDPA Cellular Phone - Windows Mobile 6.5 Professional - Black
